name: RainBow (itch) (DEMcKnight, Nanossis, Omergosh, Struckdown, erichalina)
description:
Help a world sapped of color regain its hue!

You take on the role of Raine, a child living in world left bereft of color after a calamity's theft. Armed with a magic bow, help Raine repopulate the world's pigmentation!

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse Left Button to fire the Rain Bow (hold to charge)

Made by The Owlbearta Parliament, aka:

Boris Fleysher

Dawn McKnight

Eric Halina

Jamie Powers

Omer Ahmed
